attributes.action: Impose  fines on First Great Western Trains for their poor services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fine First Great Western for their poor services (particularly between Bristol Temple Meads and Southampton Central and also between Reading and Basingstoke).  Large fines would force the company to use cleaner trains and add more carriages to ease overcrowding.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
